item.title: Twitter-API-Bot
item.dc:creator: Webmaster
item.description: URL: Twitter-API-Bot About: A Twitter bot written in python, messaging new followers, posting, etc Branches: main–…
item.content:encoded:
URL:

Twitter-API-Bot

About:

A Twitter bot written in python, messaging new followers, posting, etc

Branches:

  • main– Has local / cloudrun versionon
  • heroku – Has heroku version

Setup (main branch):

pip install -r requirements.txt

./venv/Scripts/python.exe setup.py

Run (main branch):

./venv/Scripts/python.exe main.py

Setup (heroku branch):

pip install -r requirements.txt

./venv/Scripts/python.exe setup.py

Run (heroku branch):

Designed For Use With The Procfile In Heroku
